channel.title: Account Security
channel.description:
If you want to edit your account email and the security question, shouldn't there be a delay? About 3 weeks ago I got hacked
and I couldn't get it back for awhile because the hacker instantly changed my account details.

item.title: Account Security
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:8, topic:399325”][quote author=Marine5287 link=topic=496461.msg3629430#msg3629430 date=1308089120]

i dont think its a problem with the site i think its a problem with people having easy to guess passwords and downloading things with keyloggers in them

edit:

that was to the above post i dident read the topic

Well if someone did have easy to guess passwords or key loggers, wouldn’t it be fair to let them get rid of the key logger the

proper way or edit their password, then get their account back?

yes in some way or another but i don’t think adding a delay would be the answer, maybe have some kind of confirmation system so you have to approve of any changes that are made

Yes, that’s why there’s an email that is registered to the account, but that email can be very easily changed, therefore making the chances of

getting your account back harder.
[/quote]
Maybe a password change confirmation through Via email?[/quote]

Yes that would be good, comfirmation through the email you have. What about a delay for your security question?
